Reviews.Content: worst hotels partner stayed especially medium price range bathroom filthy electric socket beds missing revealing wiring underneath bed cleanest despite snow storm raging outside heating unfriendly service encountered desk bother complain thankful leaving day pensions deal elsewhere

Reviews.Content: location corner train station close supermarket metro hostel dirty graffiti swear words beer bottle stickers walls hair floor toilets stank neither toilet seats try shower door jam dorm damaged door forced wood fixed piece metal mixed none safe leaving bags concerns saftey issues ignored staff spoke manager finally found sleepless night drunken roommates fight 3am minute lost money booked pay money refused saying basically cheap pay shocking expect people pay stay cell manager complaint judging reviews lie lesson learned book hostel research hostel lounge bar corner total bliss comparison

Reviews.Title: “NO FRILLS or power”

Reviews.Content: poor condition smelly dirty power 4 5 times night couldnt cope people floor using laptops hair dryers downstairs 6 floors reception reset everytime extremely noisy dont expect sleep beds crap bedding sheets drunk kids night basically own hands quiet complaints reception location
